game.name: DISTRAINT: Deluxe Edition
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 디스트레인트는 PC로 즐길 수 있는 심리 호러 2D 어드벤처 게임이다. 프라이스는 저명한 회사와의 동업을 위해서, 나이든 부인의 재산을 압류하는 일을 수행한다. 그리고 그 순간, 프라이스는 인간성을 팔아버린 대가를 마침내 깨닿게 되는데...
game.shortDescriptionEn: DISTRAINT is a 2D psychological horror adventure game for PC. In order to secure a partnership in a famous company, Price seizes the property of an elderly woman. In that very moment, he finds out the price of his humanity.

reviewHighlights.text: [b] Easy to suggest! 7/10 [/b] Heavy atmosphere. Simple puzzles, and a short experience. For the price, it does exactly what it promises. Worth it if...
